steps.question: Were you and the deceased married?
Was there a ongoing divorce case at the time of the deceased’s death?
Is the will directed to the spouse?
Is the will directed to the spouse?
What type of decendents are there?
Does the deceased have any surviving decendents?
Does the deceased have any surviving parents or siblings?
What type of decendents are there?
Have they waived their inheritence rights in favour of the surviving spouse?
Have the children from another relationship waived their inheritence rights in favour of the surviving spouse?
Is there a will in which the testator has mentioned you as a beneficiary?
Were you still in a relationship when the deceased died?
Does the testator have any surviving children?
Have any of the children contested the will?

steps.outcome: The spouse inherits with free disposal right, as the children have a right to subsequent inheritance.
The spouse will inherit, apart from the inheritence share which the children from another relationship will receive immediately.
steps.legal_sources: 3 kap. 1 § 1 st. 2 m. ÄB, 3 kap. 9 § ÄB é contrario, 3 kap. 2 § ÄB

steps.outcome: The spouse inherits with free disposal rights, as the children have a right to subsequent inheritance.
The spouse inherits the entire inheritence with free disposal rights, as the shared children and children from another relationship both will inherit subsequently.
steps.legal_sources: 3 kap. 1 § 1 st. ÄB, 3 kap. 9 § ÄB, 3 kap. 2 § 1 st. 2 m. ÄB, Prop. 1986/87:1 s. 2

steps.outcome: The spouse does not inherit the inheritence share of children from another relationship, as the children are entitled to their share immediately. The spouse inherit the inheritance share of the shared children with free disposal rights, as the children have a right to subsequent inheritance.
steps.legal_sources: 3 kap. 1 § 1 st. ÄB, 3 kap. 2 § 1 st. 2 m. ÄB, Prop. 1986/87:1 s. 2

steps.outcome: The spouse will inherit, apart from the statutory share which the children will receive immediately.
steps.legal_sources: 7 kap. 3 § ÄB

steps.outcome: The spouse will inherit according to the will.
steps.legal_sources: 7 kap. 3 § 1 and 3 st. ÄB, 9 kap. 1 § ÄB, 11 kap. 1 § 1 st. ÄB, Prop. 1986/87:1 s. 85

steps.outcome: The children receive their statutory share as a subsequent inheritence, meaning that the spouse inherits the rest according to the will.
steps.legal_sources: 7 kap. 3 § ÄB, 9 kap. 1 § ÄB, 11 kap. 1 § 1 st. ÄB, Prop. 1986/87:1 s. 85

steps.outcome: The spouse will inherit according to the will.
steps.legal_sources: 7 kap. 3 § 1 and 3 st. ÄB, 9 kap. 1 § ÄB, 11 kap. 1 § 1 st. ÄB, Prop. 1986/87:1 s. 85

steps.outcome: The spouse partly inherits according to the will. The spouse inherits the shared childrens’ statutory share with free disposal rights, as the children have a right to subsequent inheritance. Children from another relationship will receive their inheritence immediately.
steps.legal_sources: 7 kap. 3 § ÄB, 9 kap. 1 § ÄB, 11 kap. 1 § 1 st. ÄB, Prop. 1986/87:1 s. 85

steps.outcome: The spouse will inherit according to the will.
steps.legal_sources: 7 kap. 3 § 1 and 3 st. ÄB, 9 kap. 1 § ÄB, 11 kap. 1 § 1 st. ÄB, Prop. 1986/87:1 s. 85

steps.outcome: The spouse will inherit according to the will.
steps.legal_sources: 7 kap. 3 § 1 and 3 st. ÄB, 9 kap. 1 § ÄB, 11 kap. 1 § 1 st. ÄB, Prop. 1986/87:1 s. 85

steps.outcome: The spouse inherits with full ownership.
The spouse inherits with free disposal right.
steps.legal_sources: 3 kap. 1 § 1 st. 1 m. ÄB, 3 kap. 2 § 1 st. ÄB, SOU 1998:110 s. 83

steps.outcome: The inheritence right of the spouse will be affected by the will. However, the spouse has a right to at least 4 price base amounts.
steps.legal_sources: 9 kap. 1 § ÄB, 11 kap. 1 § 1 st. ÄB, 3 kap. 1 § 2 st. ÄB

steps.outcome: No inheritance right.
steps.legal_sources: 3 kap. 10 § ÄB, 11 kap. 8 § ÄB

steps.outcome: As you were not married to the deceased nor mentioned as a beneficiary in a will, you have no inheritence right. However, as a security you at least have a right to 2 price base amounts.
steps.legal_sources: 9 kap. 1 § ÄB, 3 kap. 1 § é contrario, 18 § 2 st. SamboL

steps.outcome: The will is not valid anymore. Hence, you have no inheritence right.
steps.legal_sources: 11 kap. 8 § ÄB

steps.outcome: The cohabitant inherits any assets designated to them as stipulated in the will.
steps.legal_sources: 9 kap. 1 § ÄB, 11 kap. 1 § 1 st. ÄB

steps.outcome: The cohabitant inherits any assets designated to them as stipulated in the will.
steps.legal_sources: 7 kap. 3 § 1 and 3 st. ÄB, 9 kap. 1 § ÄB, 11 kap. 1 § 1 st. ÄB, Prop. 1986/87:1 s. 85

steps.outcome: The cohabitant inherits according to the will apart from the statatury share of the inheritence which the children have a right to receive.
steps.legal_sources: 7 kap. 1 and 3 §§ ÄB, 9 kap. 1 § ÄB, 11 kap. 1 § 1 st. ÄB, Prop. 1986/87:1 s. 85
